The tigers hesitation gave lunarpine the chance he needed, he drew 
his rifle and turned it toward the tiger.
"OK kitty one way or another we're gonna see what you're made of, If 
you got the guts that is."

he took aim at its head.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> The tiger stood still watching Lunarpine for a moment.
